name: Snek: The Game
description:
Absorb nutrients to grow, and absorb all of them to win!  

Controls: 

WASD to move

ESC to pause

E or Enter to select menu option

Q to split yourself

If you get sick, be sure to eat the medicine to heal. 

If you get stuck, you can restart in the pause menu. 

Good luck! <3

Made by Angel, Brock, Laura, and Scott for Bear Jams 2020
